intro: Hippeophyllum celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes starling tree, is a flowering plant native to Indonesia. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its woody structure and showy, clustered flowers. The plant produces small, fleshy fruits that are often consumed by local wildlife. It thrives in tropical climates and is often found in lowland rainforests. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
